MemoryInfobox.description: 'Elpenor's brother, a politician who was unaware of Kassandra's role in Elpenor's death, feared that he was now vulnerable to bandit attack. Ironically, he hired Kassandra for protection.'

General_Description: '''Left for Dead''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra approached a statesman in [[Phokis]], and was tasked to deal with [[bandit]]s.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire, ''statesman. I don't suppose you could use a [[mercenary]]'s help today? / Need something, statesman?''
*'''Man:''' ''I'm losing everything. Not only was my brother [[Elpenor]] murdered, but my whole political career is about to disappear, too.''
<tabber>
|-|I killed Elpenor.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I am the one who killed your brother.''
*'''Man:''' ''You? You bastard! You will pay for what you did to him! He was massacred! You deserve a fate worse than death.''
(Quest failed.)
|-|Losing your family can be very hard=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I know what it's like to lose family. Toughest thing you'll ever face in your life.''
|-|I didn't know him.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Elpenor? Can't say I've heard of him.''
</tabber>
*'''Man:''' ''Elpenor was a kind and wealthy man. He financed my love for politics and protected me from harm. And now that he's gone, I risk losing everything I have left.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Is there something I can do?''
*'''Man:''' ''Ever since my brother disappeared, bandits have been attacking me. They're after the family fortune, and I'm left defenseless. If they take the money from me, then I can't continue my political career.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you're hoping I'll kill all the bandits?''
*'''Man:''' ''I beg you.''
(Accept - I'll hunt the outlaws.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'm in. / I'll handle this.''
*'''Man:''' ''Get this done quickly. / Thank you. Please be discreet.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.''
Kassandra left the man and found the bandits' camp outside the city. She slew them all and then returned.
*'''Man:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Man:''' ''Excellent work, my friend. Please, take this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra dealt with the bandits and returned to claim her reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
